::Lord Jhiaxus::
=A0
As the Sweeps start to break off Jhiaxus pulls up at a=
 steep angle. This avoids the last shots.
=A0
Jhiaxus: Don't let up. They c=
an't be finished!
=A0
Jhiaxus comes up high in the air and turns about. He =
comes at the Sweeps. At the very last second he pulls up above them and sta=
rts droping cluster bombs.
=A0
::Scorponok-Zarak::
=A0
Scorponok releases t=
wo missiles from each pincer at the nearest mass of Sweeps.

--- On Mon, 6/=
23/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonu=
s <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Re: All Out War
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com
Date: Monday, June 23, 2008, 5:28 PM








> Jhiaxus' boasts are sto=
pped as he realized that although he was effective, the 
> Sweeps had chang=
es strategy and were boxing him in. Suddenly some of the 
> rear Sweeps wer=
e destroyed by Myrmidon. Jhiaxus banks out of the trap with him.
> 
> Jhiax=
us: I hate to say this but I wish the Maximals would fight back more...
=A0=

Myrmidon grunted as he fell in with Jhiaxus, =93They are pitiful fools but=
 how can even they sit there and do nothing as the ground upon which they s=
tand is being blown out from beneath them!?=94
=A0
> As Sweeps moved into p=
osition to box in Jhiaxus again. Jhiaxus pulls up and 
> performs a 360 deg=
ree dive, ending up behind the approaching Sweeps. He 
> fires all rockets =
and lasers.
=A0
Myrmidon followed Jhiaxus, his maneuver not quite as elegan=
t as the G2 Decepticon co-commander, but he managed to come around, lining =
up on the Sweeps!
=A0
From their twin bursts of firepower many sweeps vanis=
h in bright clusters of explosions that peal through the skies! A rather re=
spectable gap is opened up for the duo as the moved through the skies. 
=A0=

> Blckfortress defences burned as Minions started to hit them, the repair =
drones 
> started to work but they started to fall as well. hydras cotinued=
 opening fire
> against the minions
=A0
The sweeps are generally taking a b=
eating, but it can be noted that they are learning as they go, becoming sma=
rter and more agile as the weaponry they are faced with begins to grow. Man=
y of them are gunned down by the laser fire of Myrmidon, Jhiaxus and then t=
he Black Fortress, and yet they continue to keep coming, an unrelenting for=
ce of power rushing the meager defenders of the Predicon base. 
=A0
With an=
 eerie strangeness, as if guided by some unseen intelligence, they fire the=
ir weapons in retaliation completely in sync, disintegrator beams ripping i=
nto the jets (Myrmidon/Jhiaxus) above and at the (Black) fortress below. Th=
en swiftly they swoop high into the air again, temporarily giving the base =
below a gap, a small space to breathe. It is obvious that any moment now th=
ey will again begin to press their attack as their numbers quickly begin to=
 regroup and organize.
=A0
> OOC: if drones arent allowed just ignore that =
part
=A0
OOC: I can=92t speak for anyone else, but I have no problem with d=
rones.
=A0
Preston
(Da'minion)
